advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
The karaoke app for everybody! Sing & record to get fans and make friends
RedKaraoke is a karaoke app to sing thousands of karaoke songs and sing alongs from Youtube and other sources. 
Rock the stage joining the biggest singer community! Sing and record your favorite songs in audio or video with the largest songbook, and share your voice in the Net with both friends and strangers who may become your fans. 

SING & RECORD: register with your email or Facebook account, and get free access to sing 10 complimentary songs. Then, if you like it, become a VIP subscriber and sing and record with thousands of karaoke and sing along, in different languages and with more than 100 music genres, from the classics karaoke to the latest hits of the charts, from Country to Heavy Metal, from Rock to Musicals, from Salsa to Dance. We curated for you the best instrumental songs and sing along from Youtube, plus our own catalogue. 

IMPROVE YOUR VOICE: Apply vocal effects in real time while singing to improve your voice, record duets with other singers from around the world, or add second voices to your recordings like a professional singer. You can also connect our app to your Apple TV for a party with friends if you want using Airplay mirroring. 

KARAOKE… & SING ALONG: Have you ever dreamed of singing with your favorite singers? Imagine a duet with Adele, Shakira, Beyoncé, Bruno Mars, Robbie Williams … or even share the stage (virtual) with Sinatra, Elvis, ABBA or The Beatles! 
RedKaraoke is the first karaoke app that makes this possible with the new “SING ALONG” service: sing & record with the original music and voice, and the lyrics on screen to make it easier. 

RECORD YOUR OWN VIDEOS: Record your own videos with the front camera of the iPhone or iPad while reading the lyrics on the screen and the music plays. It’s really easy to use, and you can get thousands of visits to your videos… and maybe you can be a sing star. Develop your potential as singer!

SHARE AND GET FANS: As a VIP member you will get more exposure for your recordings, and of course you can also share your videos and recordings on social networks to get additional fans. The more you record, the more fans you will get! More than 4 million members are waiting to listen your voice!

Remember you can use your account also in other phones and tablets, and in our website. Visit us at www.redkaraoke.com for more information. 

Leave your karaoke wishes or any idea, comment or critic in our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/redkaraokecom

Oh, if you like Red Karaoke don’t forget to leave us a review!
releaseNotes:
Update now to the IOS 8 ready version! 
We included tons of improvements, and the app is ready also for the new iPhone 6 and 6 Plus screens. 
* We fixed the issues when you sing with iOS 8
* We included the "Today" widget for the iOS 8 Notification Center with our daily recommendations
* Facebook Sign In is much easier now
* The app is improved to bright in the new bigger iPhone screens :)
* You can close the app and come back to the same place. Sweet!
* You can crop your new profile picture
* The app is now faster and much more stable. Now everything is smoother. :)
* Many small bugs killed
* New songs: 56,125 karaokes and sing alongs and counting!!
